snippet: Chelsea old boy Gus Poyet will again look to throw a spanner in the works at his former club when Sunderland host the runaway Premier League leaders on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Poyet Hopes Sunderland Can Be Chelsea Party Poopers Again
headline.main: Poyet Hopes Sunderland Can Be Chelsea Party Poopers Again

lead_paragraph: Chelsea old boy Gus Poyet will again look to throw a spanner in the works at his former club when Sunderland host the runaway Premier League leaders on Saturday.
